channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NY
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NY

item.title: Report X-2023080314
item.description:
Report X-2023080314

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-24T18:13:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-21
  • City: BINGHAMTON
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The hazmat was found in unload with a wet spot on the box which had a hole through the box as well. After I found it, I brought it over to hazmat cage and put it on the fumes hud. DescribePack: One of the jugs had a seal that failed and the lid was not tight on the jug. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: I brought it over to the hazmat cage upon finding it.

item.title: Report X-2023080243
item.description:
Report X-2023080243

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-22T15:12:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-24
  • City: ELMSFORD
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found wet. 1 container of Nu-Brite Coil Condenser Cleaner had a loose cap and leaked. Caps were then tightened and package was placed in protective bin. DescribePack: 1 container of Nu-Brite Coil Condenser Cleaner had a loose cap and leaked approximately 3 teaspoons worth of liquid. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The caps were tightened and package was placed in bin.

item.title: Report I-2023080003
item.description:
Report I-2023080003

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-21T15:11:41+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-27
  • City: Long Island City
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: DHL EXPRESS (USA), INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On 07/27/2023 hidden dangerous goods were discovered during the shipment inspection process at the DHL Express LIC facility, located at 12-12 33rd Avenue, Long Island City, NY 11106. Transportation by road has been confirmed. Shipment also contains UN3480, Lithium ion batteries, Class 9 Single Package or Inner Packaging (if any): Packaging Type: Case Material of Construction: Plastic Package Capacity: 100 g Amount in Package: 100 g Number in Shipment 1 Number Failed: 1

item.title: Report X-2023080228
item.description:
Report X-2023080228

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-21T15:11:41+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-21
  • City: ELMSFORD
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: found the package on the floor leaking. looks like possible miss handling while unloading the package from trailer. DescribePack: glass bottle broken in half DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: used proper PPE and place the leaking package in a plastic container to mitigate the spill. use absorbent pads to clean up any spillage.

item.title: Report X-2023080209
item.description:
Report X-2023080209

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-21T15:11:41+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-20
  • City: BINGHAMTON
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: A white box of flammable liquid had yellow stains on one side and inside the box with a strong smell coming from it. It was originally wet at some point but dried quickly over time. DescribePack: One of the jugs had a loose cap which caused it to leak. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: I put it in a hazmat bag and brought it over to the hazmat cage with the fumes hud on.
